name: QA Automation Engineer (C# only)
description:
We are Exness - a leading foregn exchange broker and now we will be happy to find 2 QA Engineers to join one of Exness product teams. We already have 3 Automation QA engineers, who are not dealing with manual testing at all. The team has integration tests that check the interaction of plugins with the server and they write a lot of auxiliary "helpers" for testing, develop tools for visualization and running tests. Also the team does a lot of work connected with security, signatures, encryption and certificates.

Team size: 10 people (C++ developers, QA C#, DevOps, Team Lead)
Tools for testing: .net core 5.0, nunit

What you will do:

  • Develop autotests (not UI) for 24/7 uptime services;

  • Build an automated testing infrastructure;

  • Write test cases for test automation;

  • Run tests and analyzing the results;

  • Support for autotests;

  • Participate in load testing;

  • Test of processing large amounts of data

You are best equipped for this task if you have:

  • Strong knowledge of the testing process, methodologies, approaches, and test design techniques,

  • 3+ years of automation (development) experience in C#,

  • Strong knowledge of SQL,

  • Experience in administering CI systems (TeamCity, Gitlab);

  • Experience with version control systems (GIT);

  • 4+ years of proven experience as Quality Assurance Engineer testing Backend,

  • Good knowledge in REST API, understanding microservices architecture,

  • Experience with CI systems (GitLab, Jenkins),

  • Experience managing Docker containers.

We offer:

  • Medical insurance for employees.

  • Coworking expenses compensation.

  • “Get to know your Team” trip to Cyprus.

  • Sports activities compensation.

  • Extensive learning opportunities.

  • Flexible public holidays.

  • 100% pay of Annual leave.

  • Professional Development.

Your application will be reviewed further and you will receive an update in due course if you are shortlisted. Due to high volume of applicants, we are able to contact only shortlisted candidates at this point of time.
